name: Enterprise Management 360
overview:
Enterprise Management 360 (EM360) provides subscribers with cutting-edge enterprise level independent podcasts, webinars, whitepapers, case studies and E-newsletters from the leading industry analysts, experts and vendors.

EM360 is a multi platform of communication designed to give Enterprise Executives the information they require when they require it. We do this through the EM360 website, the EM360 quarterly hardcopy report which is also available digitally, our engaged and targeted E-newsletters designed specifically to reach executives who have a vested interest in core areas and we also host key events, such as Infrastructure Management 360, Security Management 360 and Information Management 360.

EM360 is designed to deliver:

• Peer and expert business and technology perspectives • Proprietary research and analysis • Enterprise level strategy for technology • Management and organizational development techniques • IT solutions in line with CIO responsibilities • Actionable tools—all designed to help CIO’s, IT executives, and other IT professionals achieve success.

EM360 provides Enterprise Executives with:

• Techniques for aligning IT with enterprise level strategy for the business • Insight on communicating the business value of IT and CIO responsibilities • Ideas for leveraging technology for global business advantage, management and organizational development • Strategies that will create tangible business payoffs, unified communications and collaboration • Analyst content: award-winning, independent analyst news, research, and enterprise level strategy • Expert advice: thought-leadership and content from authorities in their fields.
